casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Johnny MARTINEZ Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 10, 2017

Steven B. Rasile, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 702, 158 A.3d 373 (2017), is denied.
